name: weather-agent-kd
description: Weather agent using Mastra with MCP tools to upload tts audio files to mux.

scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 npm run compile && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 mastra build
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist && cp -R files dist/files || true
scripts.build:check: npm run typecheck && npm run build:fast
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start:production
scripts.test:compile: echo 'Test compilation removed from build process'
scripts.test:claude: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-claude.ts
scripts.test:weather-agent: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-weather-agent.ts
scripts.test:stt: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-stt.ts
scripts.test:stt:deepgram: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-stt.ts files/sample.wav deepgram
scripts.test:stt:cartesia: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-stt.ts files/sample.wav cartesia
scripts.test:tts: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-tts.ts
scripts.test:tts:deepgram: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-tts.ts "Hello from Deepgram" deepgram
scripts.test:tts:cartesia: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-tts.ts "Hello from Cartesia" cartesia
scripts.test:zip: npm run build:fast && npx tsx src/mastra/scripts/test-zip.ts
